ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 82
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I ll post a warning again.. the next person to advertise a advertising ad will be banned from the list (it is just common sense), I mean this isn t a
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I'll post a warning again.. the next person to advertise a advertising ad
will be banned from the list (it is just common sense), I mean this isn't a
advertising list it is a EverQuest Quest helping list.. though I don't really
see anything wrong with advertising it yet if you put down your referrel code
then poof gone from the list and that is that..

srutkowski@... wrote:

> From: srutkowski@...
>
> Please ban this guy and stop the spam. Isn't this advertising? Isn't that
> against this list's purpose?
>
> <snip>
> From: neoscope@...
> Subject: Interesting Concept...
>
> I've found an intriguing new method for making money simply for being
> at
> your computer. I know a lot of sites like this have catches, but this one
> has
> worked for me and can work for you.
> Its easy. You just sign up at http://www.getpaid4.com/?soulsmiter and
> open an advertisement bar when you are online.
>
> -Up to $30 a month for being online.
> -Added to that is a % of what people you have referred earn (This is where
> lots of money is can be earned).
> -Surprisingly no limit to how many people you can refer.
> -The tree of referrals goes down 7 levels!
> -This means you get money from the people you refer and the people they
> refer
> and so on.
> -Remember, the internet pays well for advertisement; you might as well take
> advantage of it :)
>
> http://www.getpaid4.com/?soulsmiter
>
> Amazingly, someone I know makes $10,000 a year from his referall network.
> This is an opportunity that shouldn't be overlooked.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Want to help promote education? Help kids learn to read? AND earn
> extra income? Join our affiliate program for the successful Hooked
> on Phonics product and you will do all three!
